name: Radiant Knight
description:
Radiant Knight is my LowRez 2020 Game Jam submission made in 2 weeks. It is an RPG inspired by the likes of Zelda.

You are the King's favored Knight. He has a quest of the utmost importance for you. Are you up to the task of stopping a dark mage and saving your kingdom?

WASD - move player

Left Click - melee attack

Right Click - dodge while moving/shoot while stationary

Q - switch between melee weapons(if equipped)

E = switch between ranged weapons

M - opens/closes map

I - opens/closes inventory

ESC - save and exit game
